name: Momo's Adventure
description:
Rewind time to pass through the ruins!

A game made by me (Slumberjack) and Sacred for the Weekly Game Jam 42.

Thank you for playing it!


Your feedback is appreciated too =D

Keyboard:
A - D to move
Space to Jump
Y to select where to rewind the time
U to rewind the time

Controller:
Sticks or Directionals to move
X (Playstation) - A (xbox) to jump
R1 to select where to rewind the time
L1 to rewind the time

After playing please give me your feedback!
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScID_GejP5k1KwWShOeYWUkeizUOUQ5B-zHI_WN...
